name: Teletrooper (itch)
description:
A 2D Starfox-style shooter!

8 years in the making, TELETROOPER was the game we’d always wanted to make.

We were inspired by the non-stop shoot-and-dodge excitement of Starfox 64 and wanted to bring that into the world of the 2D pixel-precise arcade.

  • Nerve-wracking combat!
  • Over-powered weapons!
  • Hazard-filled environments!
  • Giant mechanical bosses!
  • Post-modern storyline?
  • Sprawling multi-route world map!

This game was created in 2012 on Multimedia Fusion 1.5. 
It only runs on Windows.
